get.summary: Lookup an event by gtag UID and return related data

event_id.description: The ID of the event associated with the gtag

customer_id.description: The ID of the customer associated with the gtag, or null if the gtag has no customer or belongs to a different event

gtag_active?.description: Indicates whether the gtag is active
